item.title: Timken India Ltd - Feb 2025 Earnings Call Transcript Analysis
item.description:
Earnings Call Transcript Analysis Report #

Financial Performance #

Revenue #

Timken India Limited reported its best-ever December quarter (Q3 FY25), with revenues reaching INR 671 crores, a 9.7% year-over-year (YoY) growth. Sequentially, revenue was down due to business cyclicity.

Profitability #

PBT margins stood at 14.6% for Q3 FY25, compared to 14.9% in the prior year period. This was described as a “resilient margin performance” despite an unfavourable product mix, offset by cost leverage. Compared to the previous quarter, margins were down due to adverse deleveraging costs.

item.title: Timken India Ltd:Annual Report 2023-24 Analysis
item.description:
Timken India Ltd.: A Comprehensive Overview #

About the Company #

Year of Establishment and Founding History #

Timken India Limited was established in 1987 as a joint venture between Timken US and Tata Iron and Steel Company (TISCO).

Headquarters Location and Global Presence #

The headquarters of Timken India Limited is located in Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India. Timken, as a global company, has a presence across the globe with manufacturing facilities and sales offices in numerous countries.
